title: Maru-Sensei's ** Is Cute.
alternative_title: 丸先生の○○がかわいい。 ; Maru-sensei no ** ga kawaii.
status: 丸先生の○○がかわいい。 ; Maru-sensei no ** ga kawaii.
description:
Description :
        Airheaded, but serious, and with zero leeway! "I want to be a great teacher!" says the new grade-school teacher, Maru Hana, while fruitlessly spinning her wheels in days full of disappointing mistakes. Her innocence and clumsiness, akin to a child suddenly growing up, heals those around her. This is a 4 koma comedy about a teacher that sometimes gets pushed around, but slowly but surely comes into her own!
